sourcesContent:
// src/schemas/common.schema.js

export const STATUS_OPTIONS = [
  "owned",
  "attended",
  "visited",
  "wishlist",
  "rented",
];

export const baseSchema = [
  {
    name: "status",
    label: "Status",
    type: "select",
    options: STATUS_OPTIONS,
    optional: false,
    section: "Main",
    order: 1,
  },
  {
    name: "startDate",
    label: "Start Date",
    type: "date",
    optional: true,
    section: "Details",
    order: 2,
  },
  {
    name: "endDate",
    label: "End Date",
    type: "date",
    optional: true,
    section: "Details",
    order: 3,
  },
  {
    name: "tags",
    label: "Tags (comma separated)",
    type: "text",
    optional: true,
    section: "Details",
    order: 4,
  },
  {
    name: "notes",
    label: "Notes",
    type: "textarea",
    optional: true,
    section: "Story",
    order: 5,
  },
  {
    name: "photoLink",
    label: "Photo Link",
    type: "text",
    optional: true,
    hidden: true,
    isLink: true,
    section: "Hidden",
    order: 99,
  },
  {
    name: "section",
    label: "Section Group",
    type: "text",
    optional: true,
    hidden: true,
    section: "Hidden",
    order: 100,
  },
  {
    name: "createdAt",
    label: "Created At",
    type: "date",
    optional: true,
    hidden: true,
    section: "Hidden",
    order: 101,
  },
];
